pre_caption: The video is a landscape scenery shot, capturing a serene rural environment. The focus is on the expansive sky filled with fluffy, scattered clouds that create a dynamic and ever-changing atmosphere. The road stretches into the distance, flanked by lush green fields and occasional trees, emphasizing the vastness and tranquility of the countryside. Power lines run parallel to the road, adding a sense of scale and perspective. The absence of a specific main subject allows the viewer to appreciate the harmonious blend of natural and man-made elements, highlighting the peaceful coexistence of human infrastructure and the natural landscape.
pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text.

The absence of a specific main subject allows the viewer to appreciate the harmonious blend of natural and man-made elements, highlighting the peaceful coexistence of human infrastructure and the natural landscape.
initial_feedback: 1. 在道路和右侧田野的远处，还有一些乡村的房屋，再更远处还有起伏的hills小山坡，在道路的远处尽头有一个人骑着电瓶车向camera驶来
gpt_feedback: 1. In the distance along the road and to the right of the fields, there are some rural houses. Further beyond, there are rolling hills. At the far end of the road, a person is riding an electric scooter towards the camera.
final_feedback: 1. In the distance along the road and to the right of the fields, there are some rural houses. Further beyond, there are rolling hills. At the far end of the road, a person is riding an electric scooter towards the camera.
gpt_caption: The video captures a serene rural environment, focusing on an expansive sky filled with fluffy, scattered clouds that create a dynamic and ever-changing atmosphere. The road stretches into the distance, flanked by lush green fields and occasional trees, emphasizing the vastness and tranquility of the countryside. In the distance along the road and to the right of the fields, there are some rural houses, with rolling hills further beyond. At the far end of the road, a person is riding an electric scooter towards the camera, adding a touch of life to the scene. Power lines run parallel to the road, adding a sense of scale and perspective. The absence of a specific main subject allows the viewer to appreciate the harmonious blend of natural and man-made elements, highlighting the peaceful coexistence of human infrastructure and the natural landscape.
